definitions.definition: The eyepiece of a microscope or other optical instrument.
Any of the scales forming the margin of a reptile's eye.
Of, or relating to the eye, or the sense of sight
definitions.example: It took some time after he lost his eye for him to receive his ocular prosthesis.
ocular markings on the wings of a butterfly

definitions.definition: Seen by, or seeing with, the eye; visual.
